title: Google\Cloud\NetworkConnectivity\V1\RouterApplianceInstance
name: RouterApplianceInstance
description:
A router appliance instance is a Compute Engine virtual machine (VM) instance that acts as a BGP speaker. A router appliance instance is specified by the URI of the VM and the internal IP address of one of the VM's network interfaces.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkconnectivity.v1.RouterApplianceInstance

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.ip_address
params.description: The IP address on the VM to use for peering.
